class.name: BTCheckVar
class.brief_description: BT condition that checks a variable on the blackboard.
class.description: BTCheckVar evaluates the [member variable] against [member value] and returns [code]SUCCESS[/code] or [code]FAILURE[/code] based on the [member check_type].

members.member: The type of check to be performed.
A parameter that specifies the value against which the [member variable] will be compared.
The name of the variable to check its value.
